mutants.code:
def string_reverse(input_string):
    words = input_string.split('')
    new_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    output_string = ' '.join(new_words)
    return output_string

def string_reverse(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')
    new_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    output_string = ''.join(new_words)
    return output_string

def string_reverse(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')
    new_words = [word[::+1] for word in words]
    output_string = ' '.join(new_words)
    return output_string

    words = input_string.split(' ')

def string_reverse(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')

    output_string = ' '.join(new_words)
    return output_string

    words = input_string.split(' ')

def string_reverse(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')
    new_words = [word[::--1] for word in words]
    output_string = ' '.join(new_words)
    return output_string
